result.reason: Menu bar uses DockStyle.None with visible grip allowing drag to any ToolStripPanel (top/bottom/left/right); position is saved/restored via MainMenuParentDock+MainMenuLocation settings but there is no guard ensuring the menu bar stays in the top panel when toolbars are unlocked, causing unexpected placement after drag or settings corruption.
result.approach: In AddMainMenuPanel(), validate that the restored panel is 'top' and fall back to top panel if not; optionally add a separate 'Lock Menu Bar' checkbox in AppearancePage independent of the general LockToolbars setting so the menu bar grip can be permanently hidden
